image_3.description: The Indian Child Welfare Act is a 1978 law that was upheld by the Supreme Court, which gives preference to Native families in adoption cases.

image_6.description: A 66-year-old retired interior design coordinator who struggled with weight loss and obesity-related medical problems until she started taking Wegovy, a new class of drug for obesity.

This description matches the appearance of Eileen Isotalo as described in the text. The background mural adds to the relaxed and contemplative mood, which aligns with her personal journey of overcoming obesity-related issues.
